title: Daniel Hawkins (rugby union)
text: Daniel C. Hawkins (born 20 April 1991) is a <a href="New%20Zealanders">New Zealand</a> <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> player who plays for in the <a href="Bunnings%20NPC">Bunnings NPC</a>. His position is <a href="Fly-half%20%28rugby%20union%29">First five-eighth</a>. He has played <a href="Super%20Rugby">Super Rugby</a> for the <a href="Melbourne%20Rebels">Melbourne Rebels</a>.
